title: Is the myth of youth collapsing? Why the best years of our lives start after 40
description:
Scientists explain that life gets better as we get older and happiness peaks in our 60s and 70s
The post Is the myth of youth collapsing? Why the best years of our lives start after 40 appeared first on ProtoThema English.
content: We are afraid of growing old. We are so afraid that we try to squeeze everything into our twentiesthe decade that older people recall with nostalgia, remembering their achievements, their stamina, an… [+6951 chars]
